decision_conditions: The proposed first floor rear/side infill extension, by reason of its scale, mass, bulk, design and siting, would result in a development which over-dominates and is unsympathetic to the dwelling's original scale and character, to detriment of the character and appearance of the host dwelling and local area. As such, the proposal is contrary to Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 19), SPD4 Residential Extensions and Ealing's Housing Design Guidance. | The proposed first floor rear/side infill extension, by reason of its scale, mass, bulk, design and siting, would result in an overbearing and unneighbourly form of development, that would create an increased sense of enclosure and harm the visual amenities of No. 24 Denmark Road. As such, the proposal is contrary to Policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 19).
description: Single storey side/rear (wrap around) extension to the rear; single storey rear infill extension ; additional height to existing two-storey side extension to accommodate internal staircase; single storey front/side infill extension; alteration of roof of existing single storey side extension from glazed to tiled roof; first floor rear/side infill extension along western elevation of existing outrigger; installation of two rooflight to outrigger; replacement of first floor window along rear elevation of the outrigger
